## utils.style.getViewportPageOffset() function

Calculates the viewport coordinates relative to the document. Similar to Closure's goog.style.getViewportPageOffset

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getViewportPageOffset(): Coordinate;
```
**Returns:**

[Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md)

The page offset of the viewport.
